description:
A collection of modular and reusable compiler and toolchain technologies.


- Nikita Popov: [SCEV] Don’t perform implication checks with many predicates (#158652) (b708aea0bc71)
- Kito Cheng: [RISCV] Refactor RVV builtin code generation for reduce compilation time [NFC] (#154906) (77a3b0eda361)
- Craig Topper: [RISCV] Reduce ManualCodeGen for RVV intrinsics with rounding mode. NFC (f14551dbc4e8)
- Craig Topper: [RISCV] Reduce ManualCodeGen for segment load/store intrinsics. NFC (dcc2c1c933be)
- Joseph Huber: [LLVM] Update CUDA ELF flags for their new ABI (#149534) (e625a781211e)
- Fangrui Song: MC: Better handle backslash-escaped symbols (#158780) (3e93017936b5)
- Nikita Popov: [MC] Add parseSymbol() helper (NFC) (#158106) (bc5e9a5e2009)
- Florian Hahn: [Loads] Check for overflow when adding MaxPtrDiff + Offset. (e2e5eb2f1cd9)
- Florian Hahn: release/21.x: [VPlan] Don’t narrow op multiple times in narrowInterleaveGroups. (661c387fc2f1)
- Nikita Popov: [PowerPC] Avoid working on deleted node in ext bool trunc combine (#160050) (f5c1b5206cbe)
- Younan Zhang: [Clang] Fix an error-recovery crash after d1a80dea (#159976) (db70369f400e)
- mykouHW: [ELF] -r/–emit-relocs: Fix crash when processing .rela.text before .text (#156354) (9c8736f348e0)
- Craig Topper: [RISCV] Re-work how VWADD_W_VL and similar _W_VL nodes are handled in combineOp_VLToVWOp_VL. (#159205) (15a31832eab7)
- hev: [LoongArch] Fix MergeBaseOffset for constant pool index operand (#159336) (f089fb21fffa)
- Uyiosa Iyekekpolor: [VectorCombine] Fix scalarizeExtExtract for big-endian (#157962) (9eedaf5b1001)
- owenca: [clang-format] Handle C digit separators (#158418) (5af5cfb60d9e)
- Tom Stellard: Bump version to 21.1.2 (0174263ac214)
- Pengcheng Wang: [RISCV] Support PreserveMost calling convention (#148214) (ff039a98523f)
- Abhishek Kaushik: [X86] Fix assertion in AVX512 setcc combine due to invalid APInt mask width (#155775) (1a644bc50948)
- Michael Buch: [lldb][test] Only assert function name is in user-code on Darwin platforms (2c8cb316b5d2)
- Michael Buch: [lldb][test] TestTsanBasic.py: fix function name assertion (f5ba88341e7c)
- Michael Buch: [lldb][Instrumentation] Set selected frame to outside sanitizer libraries (#133079) (faedeb1a2420)
- Michael Buch: [lldb][Target] Clear selected frame index after a StopInfo::PerformAction (#133078) (54896838ca5e)
- Tomohiro Kashiwada: [Clang][Cygwin] Use correct mangling rule (#158404) (f4907049285c)
